Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Guest Editor for the Special Issue of Small Business Economics: An Entrepreneurship Journal, entitled "Born To Be Green: The Economics and Management Of Green Start-Ups"
Associate Editor for the European Management Review http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/j ournal/10.1002/(ISSN)1740-4762/homepage/ EditorialBoard.html

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: – 2-4/8/2010, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, MIT Sloan School of Manage- ment, 8th Annual International Open and User Innovation Workshop, ‘Is Open Source about Innovation? Effects of the interactions with the Open Source Com- munity on Firms’ Innovative Performance’ – 3/7/2010, Riva del Garda, Sunbelt social networks conference, ‘An agent-based model of competitive diffusion: network structure and coexistence’ – 9-10/6/2010, Novara, III Workshop PRIN 2008, Emerging economic regional powers and local systems of production: new threats or new opportunities?, ‘An alternative approach to knowledge and technology transfer: a multifaceted index based on a fuzzy logic system’ – 15-16/3/2010, RAND Corporation Headquarters, Santa Monica (CA), US, Fourth Annual Conference of the International Society for the Study of Drug Policy, ‘Counteracting cocaine production. An analysis based on a novel dataset’ – 24-26/9/2009, Belfast, Northern Ireland, European Society for Social Drug Re- search (ESSD) 20th Annual Conference, ‘Counteracting cocaine production. An analysis based on a novel dataset’ – 2-3/7/2009, Padua(IT), 3rd FLOSS International Workshop, ‘Coexistence and Market Tipping in a Diffusion Model of Open Source vs. Proprietary Software ’ – 12-14/5/2009, Eindhoven(NL), DIME Workshop on Structure and Dynamics of Knowledge Networks, ‘Network effects and switching costs in innovation competition’ – 10-11/12/2008, Maastricht, The Netherlands, International Conference in Inno- vation and Management 2008, ‘Motives Underlying Foreign Direct Investments: a Primer’. – 6-8/11/2008, Rome, Italy, European Association for Evolutionary Political Econ- omy Conference 2008, ‘You Won the Battle. What about the War? A Model of Competition between Proprietary and Open Source Software’. – 3-4/6/2008, Padova, Italy, Final conference of PRIN Cofin 2005 - Fragmentation and local development: interpretative models and policy implications, ‘You Won the Battle. What about the War? A Model of Competition between Proprietary and Open Source Software’. – 31/5- 1/6/2007, Nice-Sophia Antipolis, France, First International Workshop on the diffusion of FLOSS and the Organisation of the Software Industry: From Social Networks to Economic and Legal Models, ‘OS Software in the public sector: results from the Emilia Romagna Open Source Survey’. – 21-24/6/2006, Nice/Sophia Antipolis, France, 11th International Schumpeter So- ciety Conference, ‘Patentability of software programs in the EU: some empirical insights’ – 8-10/6/06, Grand Hotel, Como, Italy, The second international conference on Open Source Systems, ‘Software Patents and Open Source Software in the Eu- ropean Union: Evidences of a Trade-Off?’ – 11-15/7/05, University of Genova, Genova, Italy, OSS2005 The first international conference on Open Source Systems, ‘Future Development in the European Soft- ware Industry: Patentability of Computer Programs or Open Source Software?’.

– 5-9/8/2016, 13th European Network on the Economics of the Firm (ENEF) meeting, University of Torino, Turin, Italy, ‘Better late than never: a longitudinal quantile regression approach to the interplay between green technology and age for firm growth’ – 7-9/9/2016, 50th SPRU Anniversary Conference, University of Sussex, Brighton, UK, ‘University Management Practices and Academic Spin-offs’ – 5-9/8/2016, 76th Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management, Anaheim, California, US, ‘Exploring and Yet Failing Less: learning from past and current exploration in R&D’ – 22-24/6/2016, Eurkind GCW 2016 Conference, Polytechnic University of Valencia, Valencia, Spain, ‘University Management Practices and Academic Spin-offs’ – 15-17/6/2015, DRUID summer conference, LUISS, Rome, Italy, ‘Environmental innovations and firm’s boundaries: evidence from two ecological industries in North-East Italy’ – 1-3/6/2015, EMAEE 2015 Conference: Globalisation, Innovation and Economic Change, University of Maastricht, ‘Simultaneous embeddedness in different net- works and its effect on scientific knowledge generation: evidence from Spanish scientists’ – 18-20/6/2014, EUSPRI conference, University of Manchester, Manchester, UK, ‘Simultaneous embeddedness in different networks and its effect on scientific knowledge generation: evidence from Spanish scientists’ – 1-3/11/2012, University of Nice, Nice, 2012 International Conference - The Gov- ernance of a Complex World, ‘Multi-Industry Labour Force Skills: Structure and Dynamics’ – 2-8/8/2012, Boston University, Boston, Academy of Management 2012, ‘Antecedents, searching and impact: evidence from Spanish scientists’ – 27-30/10/2011, Technical University, Wien, European Association for Evolutionary Political Economy Conference 2011, ‘A specific technology policy instrument in university-industry collaborations: how to shape the engagement of academics in consulting activities through external research budget’ – 15-17/6/2011, Copenhagen Business School, DRUID summer conference 2011, ‘Absorbing knowledge from unconventional sources. How collaborations with the Open Source community shape the innovation performance of entrepreneurial ventures’ – 15-17/6/2011, Copenhagen Business School, DRUID summer conference 2011, ‘The effect of academic consulting on research performance: evidence from five Spanish universities’
Organizzatore del Workshop "Born to be Green.The Economics and Management of Green Start-Ups", University of Southampton, Southampton, UK

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Responsabile scietifico per il progetto: "Emilia Romagna Open Source Survey"; Ente Finanziatore: Regione Emilia Romagna e Centro Regionale di Competenza per l’ E-government e la societa´ dell’informazione
Expert evaluator per il progetto: "EUNIVATION: Study on contribution of higher education"; Ente finanziatore: "European Commission"

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: One year long MSc scholarship awarded from the University of Bologna
Three years long PhD scholarship awarded from the University of Bologna
Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale a Professore di II fascia nel Settore Concorsuale 13/A4: Economia Applicata
Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale a Professore di II fascia nel Settore Concorsuale 13/A2: Politica Economica
“Outstanding Reviewer Award 2015” from the European Academy of Management Annual Conference

Best Paper Award at the 2015 University-Industry Interaction Conference, held in Berlin on 24th-26th June 2015 for the paper on "Star scientists versus interdisciplinary scientists? An inquiry into the antecedents of distinct modes of university-industry interaction".
Fellow of the UK Higher Education Academy

Academy of Management 2016 Best Paper Proceedings ‘Star scientists versus interdisciplinary scientists? An inquiry into the antecedents of distinct modes of university-industry interaction’. Tra tutti i paper accettati alla conferenza, viene selezionato il 5% migliore e inserito nei best paper proceedings.

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Sono attualmente il main supervisor di tre studenti di dottorato per i seguenti dottorati: - 2 per il PhD in Management, University of Southampton, UK - 1 per il PhD in Web Science, University of Southampton, UK
Membro del comitato scientifico per Forum Early Career Research Conference, Polytechnic University of Valencia, Spain
Internal examiner for the PhD upgrade of Gareth Beeston for the Web Science Doctoral Training Centre, University of Southampton, UK

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Professore a contratto per il corso in "International Economic Relations" del BSc in Economics, Faculty of Economics and Business Administration , Universiy of Maastricht, The Netherlands
Titolare per il corso in "Economics of Innovation" della Summer School on the Economics and Management of Innovation, European University Foundation - Campus Europae, University of Aveiro, Portugal

Nel periodo che va dal Settembre 2013 a Febbraio 2015 sono stato Lecturer in Innovation presso la University of Southampton (UK). Tra Marzo 2015 e Aprile 2016 sono stato Associate Professor ini Innovation sempre presso la University of Southampton (UK). In questo periodo sono stato titolare dei seguenti corsi a cadenza annuale: -"Economics and Management of the Firm" per il Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Management - "Sustainable and Responsible Innovation" per il Master of Science (MSc) in Strategy and Innovation - "Current trends in the Economics and Management of Innovation" per il Master of Science (MSc) in Strategy and Innovation - "Advanced Competitive Analysis" per il Master of Science (MSc) in International Management

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: ATTIVITÀ DI DOCENZA IN ITALIA Sono stato professore a contratto per i seguenti insegnamenti A. A. 2008/09 - 2009/10 Insegnamento Statistica economica Corso di studio Operatore Giuridico d’Impresa Sede Facoltà di Giurisprudenza Nome dell’organizzazione Università di Bologna, Sede di Ravenna Coordinatore Prof.ssa Anna Montini Data A.A. 2006/07 - 2008/09 Insegnamento Economia dello Sviluppo e Cooperazione Internazionale Corso di studio Master in Diritti Umani ed Intervento Umanitario Sede Facoltà di Scienze Politiche Nome dell’organizzazione Università di Bologna Coordinatore Prof. Riccardo Leoncini Data A.A. 2004/05 - 2008/09 Insegnamento Economia Politica Corso di studio Operatore Giuridico d’Impresa Sede Facoltà di Giurisprudenza Nome dell’organizzazione Università di Bologna, Sede di Ravenna Coordinatore Prof. Riccardo Leoncini

SUPERVISIONE DI TESI DI MASTER E LAUREA SPECIALISTICA > 2006-2009 Supervisione di 3 tesi di master relative al programma Master in Diritti Umani ed Intervento Umanitario, Facoltà di Scienze Politiche, Università di Bologna >2013-2016 Supervisione di un totale 24 tesi di master relative ai seguenti programmi: MSc in Strategy and Innovation, University of Southampton; MSc in Digital Marketing, University of Southampton; MSc Global Enterprise and Entrepreneurship, University of Southampton

>ATTIVITA' DI REFERAGGIO: Sono regolare referee (più di una volta all'anno) per le seguenti riviste di fascia A ANVUR: Research Policy; Journal of Economic Geography; Technological Forecasting and Social Change, International Journal of Industrial Organization, Regional Studies, Small Business Economics, Journal of Economic Behaviour and Organization; Economics of Innovation and New Technology; Industry & Innovation >Sono stato reviewer per la VQR 2011-2014 per le aree GEV13 (Scienze Economiche e Statistiche) e GEV9 (Ingegneria Industriale e dell'Informazione) > 2014-2016: Sono stato reviewer per due grant proposals dello UK European Science Research Council su temi relativi a economics of science and innovation

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione in qualità di ricercatore al "PRIN 2003 - Dynamic capabilities, firm organization and local systems of production "; Unità di ricerca: Università di Bologna

Visiting research fellow presso i seguenti istituti: > Da Settembre 2016 presso Department in Strategy, Innovation and Entrepreneurship, University of Southampton, Southampton, UK > Gennaio-Aprile 2010 presso INGENIO [CSIC-UPV], Polytechnic University of Valencia, Valencia, Spain > Febbraio-Novembre 2006 presso UNU-MERIT, University of Maastricht, Maastricht, The Netherlands > Settembre-Dicembre 2003 presso Centre of research in Innovation and Competition (CRIC) [ora Manchester Institute of Innovation research] , University of Manchester, Manchester, UK
Partecipazione in qualità di ricercatore al "PRIN 2005 - Fragmentation and Local Development: interpretative models and policy implications"; Unità di ricerca: Università di Bologna

Partecipazione in qualità di research fellow al "Studio per la Commissione Europea - Study into effects of allowing patent claims on computer-implemented inventions"; Unità di ricerca: UNU-MERIT, University of Maastricht, Maastricht, The Netherlands
